channel.title: Posts on Auguste's website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Auguste's website

item.description: Nix for Python, attempt number 1 Disclaimer: This is less of a tutorial and more of a record of my past experience—in particular, I end up not reaching my stated goal for this post. I’ve been reading this book on Hypermedia Systems, and one of the things they do is develop a small CRUD application in Python for which the code can be found here. Like the good software citizens they are, they’ve included a full detailed list of their project dependencies as a requirements.
